item.title: AWS one punch
item.author: sec.gary@gmail.com (GaryZhu)
item.description: Background There was a time when I was working on a feature which required changes to more than ten microservices. In the dev testing stage I got all the services up running in the cloud by applying Cloudformation changes from local.
